pr_title: Do not create a new Exam Session when viewing the Summary

timeline.message: Do not create a new Exam Session when viewing the Summary
Add two handy methods to get the individual end date of a student exam
Add new checks for exam review
Refactor other method and avoid duplication
Always allow instructors to see everything and refactor code a bit
Get the user upfront and avoid many database queries

fix modeling exercise assement access & remove the score in points of the quiz submission
Instructors should always be able to see the assessment if an assessment is available
Small refactorings

timeline.bodyText: Unless this is needed in the webapp, we should mark this with @JsonIgnore. I think otherwise, Jackson will serialize this.
timeline.author: kloessst

timeline.bodyText: Unless this is needed in the webapp, we should mark this with @JsonIgnore. I think otherwise, Jackson will serialize this.
timeline.author: kloessst

timeline.bodyText: I think there is a @link missing
timeline.author: kloessst

timeline.bodyText: I don't see where this is used.
timeline.author: kloessst

replies.bodyText: This is used in line 217 for example :)
replies.author: fde312

replies.bodyText: You are right, it is not used in this method.

replies.bodyText: Isn't 217 another method? I don't see where currentUser is passed to another method. Maybe I'm blind :)

replies.bodyText: (Sorry didn't see Stefan's comment, GitHub should add auto-refresh for that)
replies.author: MaisiKoleni

timeline.bodyText: Is it intended that students who haven't submitted their solution, can use this call after their exam ended? This wasn't possible before.
timeline.author: kloessst
kloessst

timeline.bodyText: I think this still isn't right. Scenario hand-in early: isSubmitted = true & isEnded = false. This would lead to forbidden(). Couldn't we just use isSubmitted? If the student handed in his exam then his exam is definitely over.
timeline.author: kloessst

timeline.message: Merge branch 'exam/view-summary-no-session' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into exam/view-summary-no-session
Extract submission generation code into method and avoid duplication
